content:
I was inspired to try mixed media because I wanted to add more texture and depth to my paintings. I've always been fascinated by the impasto style of artists like Van Gogh and Willem de Kooning, and I wanted to explore ways to achieve similar effects in my own work. I also wanted to challenge myself and try something new, as I felt like I was getting stuck in a rut with my traditional oil painting techniques.

As for what I hope to achieve with mixed media, I want to continue experimenting with different textures and effects to create more dynamic and engaging paintings. I'm particularly interested in capturing the rough, rugged quality of the natural world, and I think mixed media can help me achieve that.

I'm also hoping to use mixed media to create more expressive and emotive paintings. I want my work to convey a sense of energy and movement, and I think the textures and effects I can achieve with mixed media will help me do that.

Ultimately, I'm excited to see
